OrgName.entry: CENTRE FOR PREGNANCY NUTRITION - UNIVERSITY OF SHEFFIELD

Desc.entry: A University of Sheffield project which provides scientifically valid and up-to-date information for women who are planning a pregnancy, already pregnant or breastfeeding. Also provides information for the media and professional colleagues. Maintains a database of all nutritional studies carried out in human pregnancy over the last 40 years. Can also provide literature searches for researchers.
